survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Digital Onboarding Tools Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee satisfaction with the digital onboarding tools and processes used in their organization, identifying areas for improvement to enhance the onboarding experience.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the digital onboarding tools provided by your company?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure mobile-friendly display.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the digital onboarding tools provided by your company?

questions.question_text: Which of the following digital onboarding tools did you use? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes with an open-text option for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following digital onboarding tools did you use? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What was the most helpful aspect of your digital onboarding experience?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What was the most helpful aspect of your digital onboarding experience?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the ease of use of the digital onboarding tools?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency with Q1.

script.question_text: How would you rate the ease of use of the digital onboarding tools?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the digital onboarding process?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather actionable feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the digital onboarding process?
